document.full_text: the 30-year-old capital case of delma banks jr. returns to court on monday, and defense lawyers are trying to bar one of the original prosecutors as lacking objectivity.
document.title: the texas tribune: 30-year-old capital case returns to court, with defense alleging bias
lines_and_colors: the 30-year-old capital case of delma banks jr. returns to court on monday, and defense lawyers are trying to bar one of the original prosecutors as lacking objectivity.
